model

Class And

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AbstractOperator
      • model.And
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clause, PCExpression

    public class And
extends AbstractOperator
    This class represents and-clauses. It is a n-ary operator. It extends AbstractOperator.
    Author:
    Alexandre Camus

    • Method Detail

      • create

        protected And create(List<Clause> operands)
        Generic constructor of the object. It allows the methods of the abstract class AbstractOperator to create the correct object very easily.
        Specified by:
        create in class AbstractOperator
        Parameters:
        operands - the operands of the and-operator in an List object.
        See Also:
        AbstractOperator.create(java.util.List)

      • getSolver

        public AndSolutionNode getSolver(RuleSet rules,
                        SubstitutionSet parentSolution,
                        AbstractSolutionNode parentNode)
        Creates a solver which is a node in the tree proof. This is the version for the and operator.

        This function is recursive over all objects that can be proved and creates the tree of proof for a clause.

        Parameters:
        rules - the RuleSet object containing the rules of knowledge.
        parentSolution - the solution known so far at the parent node.
        parentNode - the parent node in the tree.
        Returns:
        the node of the tree of proof.
        See Also:
        Clause.getSolver(RuleSet, SubstitutionSet, AbstractSolutionNode)

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns the and-clause under the form of: "operand1 & operand2 & ...".
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        See Also:
        Object.toString()
